name: Jes Skolnik
byline: Jes Skolnik is the managing editor at Bandcamp, a contributing writer for Pitchfork and other publications, a musician, a punk, and a tuff dude with a big heart, strong ethics and a passion to give what they can to help others through this garbage world. You can find them being critical, cranky, and posting animal pictures and links to music they love on Twitter @modernistwitch.
